title: Ticket #2130: autocluster machine ads
description: Many slot ads are likely to be identical for matchmaking purposes. Matchmaking could be sped up by auto-clustering them.
remarks:
2011-Jun-14 14:35:50 by jrt:
Is this different from MatchList? MatchList seems to be a list of slots that match a specific autocluster.

2011-Jun-14 14:41:54 by danb:
We are talking about an optimization in the algorithm that generates the MatchList. Rather than trying to match the job to all machines, it would try to match it to each auto-cluster of machines (where all machines in one auto-cluster are identical for matchmaking purposes).
creator: danb
